RelatedSentence: A Federal Communications Commission proposal to trim Internet and telephone subsidies to schools and libraries is raising red flags in cash - strapped school districts .

RelatedSentence: The subsidies , known as E - rates , underwrote more than $ 1.1 billion in costs for telephone service , new websites , Internet connections and email access for 1,100 Pennsylvania schools and libraries between 1998 and 2012 , according to the Pennsylvania Association of School Business Officers .
